overview: Antoniu is Head of Engineering at LiveRail and is responsible for the world-class engineering and development that LiveRail delivers. Antoniu leads his team based in Cluj- Napoca, Romania and brings over 15 years of experience to LiveRail with an in-depth understanding of server programming and networking concepts. Before joining LiveRail, Antoniu held the position of Chief Technology Officer and Technical Adviser to Trilulilu, Romaniaâ€™s largest, and most visited, online community for media sharing. Prior to this, Antoniu was a consultant for various US and France based companies, including Orange and France Telecom. Antoniu is a graduate of Technical University, Cluj-Napoca.
